body:
Hi,

Thank you for your interest in Oracle Integration Cloud. The links and information that you requested are below:
•         Learn more about Integration Cloud - https://bit.ly/oiclp
•         See what the experts are saying about our integration strategy by reviewing the latest Analyst Report - https://bit.ly/oicarep
•         Five Ways to Simplify Cloud Integration Whitepaper - https://bit.ly/oicpaper
•         See how other customers have benefited from Integration Cloud - https://bit.ly/oicrefs
•         Hear more about Integration Cloud - https://bit.ly/oicvideo 

Thank you,
Oracle team
